high_descs: Pick up the credit card under the pen on the desk. .
Bring the card to the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card by the light of the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: turn left a bit, walk forwards a bit, then turn right and walk to the desk
grab the credit card off of the desk there
move to the right a bit and face to desk again
turn the lamp on on the right side of the desk
anns.task_desc: turn a lamp on while holding a credit card

high_descs: turn left, walk to the cabinet on the right
grab the credit card on the cabinet
walk to the left a little
turn on the lamp on the cabinet
anns.task_desc: grab the credit card on the cabinet, turn on the lamp on the cabinet

high_descs: Turn around then turn right and face the desk.
Pick up the credit card laying under the blue pen on the desk.
Turn right and move towards the bed then turn left and face the desk an place the card on the corner of the desk.
Turn the light on at the back of the desk.
anns.task_desc: The robot should move the card from under the pen on the desk to the right corner of the desk and turn on the lamp on the desk.
